TopicTitle: Introduce two person capsule, add one kerbal lander earlier

Articles.Content:
I'd like to suggest that a two-kerbal capsule be added and introduced in the tech tree somewhat early on, roughly at a point where it could be accessed after some Kerbin orbit experience has been gathered. This bigger capsule will add some realism, and excitement, by being a 'midrange' vehicle, and making early Mun missions make more sense.

I'd also suggest the one kerbal lander can be made available earlier, for the same reason.

Perhaps these both could be at the first or second exploration node?

move SAS several steps up the tree, move reactions wheels up to the first step, make the tailfin (and small control surface?) available immediately (or even better a nerfed delta-deluxe winglet)

make angle snap part of stability, and put symmetry general construction?
